resources.string: This app uses drag-sort-listview, MPAndroidChart and android-wheel libraries licensed under Apache 2.0.
If you encounter a bug or have any suggestions or comments, don\'t hesitate to send an email to the address below.
A solve type with the same name already exists
A step with the same name already exists for this solve type
Are you sure you want to delete the solve type \'%1$s\' and all its times?
Are you sure you want to start a new session?
This solve type contains some times. Adding steps will delete them. Are you sure you want to continue?
You must create at least two steps
The steps count limit has been reached
This solve type name is reserved.\nPlease pick an other one.
Are you sure you want to delete all the times for this solve type?
Are you sure you want to delete the whole history?
Hold and release: Push and release once to start
Automatic: Automatic start when inspection is over
Official: Push for 0.5s to start, use official +2/DNF inspection rules
Display time when timer is running
Edit, create and delete solve types
Choose the big cubes notation system
Choose between banner, interstitial or mixed
Do you want to clear the scramble cache?
Choose when / how scrambles are generated
Choose when to display generation notification
Number of scrambles to generate when charging
The minimum cache size is bigger than the maximum. Min will be set to %1$d
The minimum cache size is too close to the maximum. Min will be set to %1$d
The maximum cache size is smaller than the minimum. Max will be set to %1$d
The maximum cache size is too close to the minimum. Max will be set to %1$d
The scrambles count is not valid.
If you like Nano Timer, please take a moment to rate it.\nThank you for your support.
Could not find the market app
Show \"Edit more solve types\" in list
Steps can not be added to blind types.\nUse a non-blind type instead.
Could not find any data to export
Please select at least one solve type to export
You need to grant read permissions in order to import
Read permission was denied, can not import.
Invalid columns count. Please check the import file format or try re-exporting.
Could not resolve cube type \'%1$s\'.\nPlease check input file, or try updating.
Could not resolve scramble type \'%1$s\' for cube type \'%2$s\'.\nPlease check input file, or try updating.
Inconsistencies found in solve type \'%1$s\' of cube type \'%2$s\'.\nPlease check input file or contact support at %3$s.
Reading import file…\n(this might take a few minutes depending on file size)
The following solve types do not exist:\n%1$s\nDo you want to create them?
Times imported successfully!\n%1$d new times were inserted.
No new time was inserted because they were already in database.
No import data found in file.
Invalid import file format. Please select a valid import file, or try re-exporting.
Invalid value. Please enter an integer number.

I just solved the %1$s cube in %2$s!

Scramble:
%3$s

Timed on %4$s with Nano Timer android app:
%5$s

I just solved the %1$s cube in %2$s with the following steps times:
%3$s
Scramble:
%4$s

Timed on %5$s with Nano Timer android app:
%6$s
Can not add a time when there is no scramble

v1.3.14 (New version)
  • Fixed import feature on newer Android versions
v1.3.13
  • Fixed crash that some users were experiencing
v1.3.12
  • Updated target Android version and dependencies
  • Allow to undo +2 by clicking a second time on it
v1.3.11
  • Fix bug during times import that was causing imported solve times to not be correct
v1.3.10
  • Fix crash that happened when trying to add steps to a solve type
v1.3.9
  • Unlock all features for everyone (no more paying Pro version)
  • Nano Timer is now free and open source!
v1.3.8
  • Fix issue with some texts that were too small on some devices
v1.3.7
  • Remove ads
  • Fix Megaminx scramble starting move
v1.3.6
  • Allow to add comments to solves
  • Add ao5 and ao12 to progression graph
  • Fix solve times rounding
  • Upgrade target android version
  • Changed ad provider
v1.3.5
  • Add "High precision timer" option
v1.3.4
  • Fix timer layout that was not showing properly on low resolution devices
v1.3.3
  • Make app compatible with Android 2.3.3 and above
  • Fix occasional app crashes
v1.3.2
  • Keep one CPU core idle when generating scrambles to avoid freezing app while timing
  • Fix language switching that did not work properly on some devices
  • Improve cube type selection screen UI when editing solve types via settings
  • Fix dialog that sometimes appeared multiple times when changing scrambles quality
  • Allow to add back the default solve type after deleting it
  • Add close button to release notes
  • Fix occasional app crashes
v1.3.1
  • Fix crash that happened upon launch on some devices
  • Fix crash that could happen when exporting big amounts of times
v1.3.0
  • Rework user interface
  • Add support for French and Spanish languages
  • Add support for special 3x3x3 scramble types to practice only F2L, last layer, PLL, edges and more
  • Add support for Square-1 and Pyraminx random-state scrambles
  • Take advantage of multi-cores for scrambles generation
  • Merge normal and high scramble qualities preferences
  • Adapt import permissions for Android Kitkat and above
  • Adapt scrambles generating notification icon for Android Lollipop and above
v1.2.1
  • Add support for 3 different Clock scramble styles (via Settings)
  • Generate new scramble when inspection results in DNF
  • Allow to use official inspection mode with no inspection time
  • Fix official inspection bug when inspection resulted in DNF
v1.2.0
  • Add scramble to \"Share time\" content
  • Add new \"Official\" inspection mode (push for 0.5s to start, use official +2/DNF inspection rules)
  • Support new Clock scramble notation style (enable in Settings)
  • Only consider the middle 90% of times for avg50 and avg100
  • Fix inspection time setting
v1.1.9
  • Fix averages table layout that did not display correctly on some devices
  • Fix incorrect last averages when importing old times
  • Other minor fixes and improvements
v1.1.8
  • Hide action bar menu button when timer is running
  • Fix import bug that was causing PB flag to be incorrect
  • Fix PB flag recalculation after time deletion
  • Fix crash that was sometimes happening when changing options
v1.1.7
  • New \"Share time\" feature allowing to share times with your friends
  • Moved \"Add time\" menu to timer screen to save with current scramble, and switched to text entries instead of wheels
  • Minor fixes and improvements
v1.1.6
  • Pro: Import times from CSV (synchronization handled to avoid inserting times that already exist). Requires a re-export.
  • Pro: Enter times manually
  • Pro: New frequency graph (solves count over time)
  • Pro: Allow to export times with and without steps all at once
  • Moved export/import buttons to main menu
  • Improved graphs smoothing
  • Various fixes and improvements
v1.1.5
  • Show best times (accessible from history screen menu)
  • Show session start in session details
  • Pro: Allow to see previous sessions details (not retro-active)
  • Pro app update check
  • Improved Android 5.0 UI
v1.1.4
  • Added icon next to best times in history
  • New setting to hide time when timer is running
  • New official inspection warning sounds and setting
  • Adapted automatic inspection mode to start on release
  • Added standard deviation and best time to session details
  • Scrambles generation when plugged in is now on by default
  • Disabled inspection for blind solve types
  • Updated app theme
v1.1.3
  • Pro: added progression graph
  • Fixed crash sometimes happening when device is plugged in/out
  • Removed non-used permissions
v1.1.2
  • Added random-state scrambles customization options
  • Option to automatically generate scrambles when device is charging
  • Added support for Pro version
  • Pro: export history to CSV by mail
v1.1.1
  • New random-state scrambles for 3x3x3 and 2x2x2
  • Scrambles pre-generation
  • Timer screen fields changes (means to averages)
  • New blind solve mode with additional blind-related statistics
  • Session details window improvements
v1.1.0
  • Improved graphical interface
  • New \"session details\" timer window
  • Total solves count now shown in history
v1.0.2
  • Scrambles for Square-1 and Clock
  • Average of 50
  • Shortcut to solve types editing from solve types list
  • Improved scrambles format based on type and orientation
  • Displayed averages in history details
  • Option to choose big cubes notation system
  • Set Skewb and Pyraminx scramble sizes to 15
v1.0.1
  • Changed session times grid order (the latest time is now in the top-left cell)
  • Reduced length of pyraminx and skewb scrambles from 25 to 20
  • Pyraminx corner moves are now at the end of the scramble
  • Minor GUI improvements
